title: Google\Cloud\Billing\V1\BillingAccount
name: BillingAccount
description:
A billing account in GCP Console.

You can assign a billing account to one or more projects.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.billing.v1.BillingAccount

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: The resource name of the billing account. The resource name has the form billingAccounts/{billing_account_id}. For example, billingAccounts/012345-567890-ABCDEF would be the resource name for billing account 012345-567890-ABCDEF.

params.name: data.open
params.description: Output only. True if the billing account is open, and will therefore be charged for any usage on associated projects. False if the billing account is closed, and therefore projects associated with it will be unable to use paid services.

params.name: data.display_name
params.description: The display name given to the billing account, such as My Billing Account. This name is displayed in the GCP Console.

params.name: data.master_billing_account
params.description: If this account is a subaccount, then this will be the resource name of the master billing account that it is being resold through. Otherwise this will be empty.
